## Download data

Go to <https://github.com/Center-for-Health-Data-Science/FromExceltoR/tree/2024_Mar/Data> and download the folder. Read the section below about file structure for recommendations on this.

## File structure

Make a project folder. Inside this, make a script and a data folder. Save the downloaded data in the data folder and save your scripts (Quarto documents) in the scripts folder.
